Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanbrain: A plate with a boiled brain on it and served with Bubbleberry leaves.
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanliverfri: A plate of roasted liver with fries.
Override.entityname.he-cookedhumankidneyjerky: Boiled Kidney with Jerky and Seaweed
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhumankidneyje: A plate with a boiled kidney, 2 strips of jerky and some seaweed.
Override.entityname.he-cookedhumanroastgravy: Roast with Gravy, Mashed Pomegrenade and Seaweed
Override.entitydescription.he-cookedhumanroastgra: A plate of roast with some delicious gravy poured on top, mashed pomegrenades and some seaweed.
Override.entitydescription.he-smoothbrainjuicegla: A glass of fresh smooth-brain juice. You can still see some thoughts bubbling up. Maybe they'll help you think better? Rich in protein.
Override.entitydescription.he-bloodmilkglass: A glass of what the chef says is fresh strawberry milk. You may enjoy it as long as you don't think about the fact that strawberries don't exist on Europa. Rich in calcium and sugar.
